Articles.Content: Hi, I would like to install the kerbal version 1.2.1 and not the current 1.2.2, I sent an email to the support it gave me no answer.

1.2.1 is not currently available for download, sorry.

I guess the question is: Why do you want 1.2.1? Most mods are available for 1.2.2 now.

All mods that work in 1.2.1 or 1.2 also work in 1.2.2. Kopernicus is the only mod I can think of that's version-locked, but it does have a working version for 1.2.2, so you shouldn't have a problem there either.
